snippet: Wesley Matthews spent enough time with Damian Lillard in Portland to know exactly what he was going to do in the waning seconds Wednesday night....
lead_paragraph: Wesley Matthews spent enough time with Damian Lillard in Portland to know exactly what he was going to do in the waning seconds Wednesday night.

headline.main: Barnes Scores 28 and Mavericks Hold Off Trail Blazers, 96-95
